installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

# Install game server - create folder to hold files
install_dir="/mnt/server"
cd /tmp
mkdir -p "${install_dir}/steamcmd"
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C "${install_dir}/steamcmd"
mkdir -p "${install_dir}/steamapps" # Fix steamcmd disk write error when this folder is missing
cd "${install_dir}/steamcmd"
./steamcmd.sh +@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows +force_install_dir "${install_dir}" +login anonymous +app_update 545990 validate +quit

# Install server files
cd "${install_dir}"
cp -r ./UnrankedServer/* .
curl -Ls "https://codeload.github.com/Dss0/t7-server-config/zip/refs/heads/main" -o main.zip
unzip -o main.zip
cp -r ./t7-server-config-main/* .
echo "Installed server config files"

# Install boiii
mkdir -p mods
curl -Ls "https://updater.xlabs.dev/boiii/boiii.exe" -o "boiii.exe"
echo "Installed boiii"

# Installing IW4M
if [ ${IW4M} ]
then
# Create the installation directory
mkdir -p "${install_dir}/iw4m"
cd "${install_dir}/iw4m"

# Download IW4M
curl -Ls "https://github.com/RaidMax/IW4M-Admin/releases/download/2023.05.15.1-prerelease/IW4MAdmin-2023.05.15.1.zip" -o main.zip
unzip -o main.zip
rm main.zip

# Download the config
curl -Ls "https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/749611171216359474/1108504949836496996/Configuration.zip" -o main_iw4m.zip
unzip -o main_iw4m.zip -d Configuration
rm main_iw4m.zip

# CD back
cd "${install_dir}"
fi

# Cleanup
rm -r steamapps steamcmd main.zip README.md t7-server-config-main UnrankedServer
rm BOIII_CP_Server.bat BOIII_MP_Server.bat BOIII_ZM_Server.bat copydedicated.bat Launch_Server.bat

# Done
echo "Done!"
